CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 8, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Pittsburghers Enjoy a Sporting Holiday Weekend - Lovely!  Mrs. Katherine [Katharyne] Irvis, Pittsburgh's most famous woman tennis player, and holder of the national Negro women's singles championship, is smiling after wining in the women's doubles. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Katharyne Anne "Kitten" Irvis, swinging tennis racket, on tennis court
